lines.text: What *shall* we do? General Pershing is lost.
There's Uncle Dudley - Maybe he'll let us go up in his balloon.
I'll telephone! That overgrown Kewpie can't get ahead of me.
You've given me eight 'wrong numbers', nine 'busy buzzes' and four 'informations'. What else have you?
What do you expect for a nickel - the White House?
The poor nut didn't know whether he was calling Minneapolis or Mexico.
Keep an eye on that bird - if he isn't crazy he's got a running start.

[Final lines]
Again - A lone wanderer roams the world facing the drab dawn of a dead tomorrow.
